item.title: Visualization collection
item.description: High dimensional scatterplot, diagnal plots are the require(GGally) ## Loading required package: GGally ## Warning: package 'GGally' was built under R version 3.3.2 data(tips, package="reshape") ggpairs(data=tips, # data.frame with variables columns=1:3, # columns to plot, default to all. title="tips data", # title of the plot mapping=ggplot2::aes(colour = sex) #colour = "sex" ) # aesthetics, ggplot2 style ## `stat_bin()` using `bins = 30`. Pick better value with `binwidth`. ## `stat_bin()` using `bins = 30`.
